channel.title: +Stoves on Vishvas's notes
channel.description: Recent content in +Stoves on Vishvas's notes

item.title: Wood Stove
item.description: Cubes with 1 side open If the combustion area is large enough and not cramped, equivalent to burning wood out in the open. Or in principle equivalent to a “Cube with 2 sides open” type stove with pot on top. Example: traditional homa-kUNDa-s (Idealized). Characteristics Consumes quite a bit of wood. Lot of smoke when the fire is low, and in the initial and terminal stages. Ash accumulation + charcoal creation observed.
